name: Blueberry-Nectarine Summer Pudding
keywords: blueberry, lemon juice, nectarine, dessert, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 7 large nectarines, each peeled, pitted and cut into 6 slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Arrange the brioche in a 7 1/2-by-11 1/2-inch shallow baking dish in a single or slightly overlapping layer. Place the nectarines in a large bowl and toss with the lemon juice and 1/2 cup of sugar. Layer the nectarines over the bread.

Place the berries in the bowl and toss with 2 tablespoons of sugar. Scatter over the nectarines. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until very soft but not mushy, about 45 minutes to 1 1/2 hours, depending on the ripeness of the fruit. Serve warm or at room temperature.
